replies.body: Will KingCalzy be playing? He's bronze 4 and got demoted multiple times, even know hes been playing for over a year. I really would like to see his "pro plays" as support and trying to win against this years LSC team's bot laners.{{champion:40}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:37}} {{summoner:3}}
No, he's too bad to even try against Bronze 5's, he got carried to Bronze 4 by some awesome Mysticz guy... {{item:3410}}
